s.text: And when he wasn't Able to wangle an invitation he lived On dishes of cheap gray lamb, inveighing against Gluttons and prodigals, saying they ought to be branded.

When there isn't a lot to be had, I'm very good at praising moderation; But when there's something better and richer offered, Why then I'm very good at praising how You rich men live and dine in your splendid houses.
So I have to change my route and drive right past The old familiar places.
So I have to change my route and drive right past The old familiar places.
